sentences.en: Barr strongly disagreed with Kronfeld’s statement.
sentences.cn: 巴尔强烈反对克龙费尔德的说法。

sentences.en: European farm ministers disagree among themselves.
sentences.cn: 欧洲各国的农业部长之间意见不一致。
即便是朋友有时也有分歧。

sentences.en: He likes to fight it out whenever others disagree with him.
sentences.cn: 当别人与他意见不一致时,他总喜欢争个明白.

sentences.en: I disagree with Andrew Russell over his piece on British Rail.
sentences.cn: 我不同意安德鲁·拉塞尔那篇关于英国铁路公司的文章。

sentences.en: I disagree with drug laws in general.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，我反对药品法。

sentences.en: I disagree with you, but don't let's make a thing of it!
sentences.cn: 我不同意你的观点, 但是我们不要把这点看得过重.

sentences.en: I strongly disagree with this amoral approach to politics.
sentences.cn: 我强烈反对这种对待政治不辨是非的态度。

sentences.en: I'vemade this argument, and not a few people would disagree with me.
sentences.cn: 我提出了此论点，而这会是相当多的人都不同意的。

sentences.en: Local public housing authorities disagree with this reading of the law.
sentences.cn: 当地的公共住房管理当局不同意对该法律的这种解读。

sentences.en: Orange juice seems to disagree with some babies.
sentences.cn: 橙汁似乎不适合某些婴儿饮用。

sentences.en: Scientists disagree about how the universe was created.
sentences.cn: 科学家对宇宙是怎样形成的有分歧。

sentences.en: She'll probably disagree, though it's worth trying.
sentences.cn: 她很可能不同意, 但不妨去试一下.

sentences.en: The statements of several witnesses disagree.
sentences.cn: 几名证人的证词不一致。

sentences.en: They can communicate even when they strongly disagree.
sentences.cn: 即便在有很大分歧时，他们也还是能够交流。

sentences.en: You and I are going to have to agree to disagree then.
sentences.cn: 那你我只能各自保留不同意见了。

words.tran_cn: 不愉快的；厌恶的；不为人喜的；难相处的；脾气坏的

phrases.tran_cn: 消除分歧，求同存异；同意各自保留不同意见
在…方面意见不统一；对…意见不一

trans.tran_en: to have or express a different opinion from someone else
to have or express a different opinion from someone else
